name: Cherry

topics.response_text: The sooner we get there, the better.
Dukov likes to keep it hot. Ain't no need for nothin' else.{emphasize "hot" to imply both physical heat and sex }

topics.topic_text: You should come with me. You can't survive here by yourself.
topics.response_text: Only if you take me to Rivet City.

topics.topic_text: So what's the deal with Dukov?
topics.response_text: He's a lecherous old man. The only reason I put up with him and his "needs" is because I'm safe here.

topics.topic_text: Damn! I wish I had a setup like this.
topics.response_text: You're a pig, you know that?

topics.topic_text: Does he pay you for this?
topics.response_text: Of course. Why else would I stay with the old fart? You don't think I actually love that bastard, do you?

topics.topic_text: No. It's going to be a while before I go to Rivet City.
topics.response_text: Screw it then. I'm not wandering the Wasteland with you.
Let me pack my bags. Oh, wait, I don't have any. Lets get out of here.{the "Oh wait, I don't have any" is sarcastic.}

topics.topic_text: I'm sure you can find a way to survive here.
topics.response_text: Right. Because I've got all kinds of survival skills.{Sarcastic. Draw out the word "right"}

topics.topic_text: So... What exactly is this place?
topics.response_text: It's...well, it's Dukov's place. He lives here.

topics.topic_text: Admit it. You're just a whore.
topics.response_text: Up yours! It's not like I've got a lot of other options.

topics.topic_text: I guess you'll just have to live with your choice.
topics.response_text: Hey, its my life. Butt out.
Here's the key. He never even noticed.

topics.topic_text: Dukov has a key I need. Steal it for me.
topics.response_text: You've got to do something for me first.
Why the hell should I trust you?

conversation.response_text: You're a goddamn liar. You told me we were going to Rivet City but we've been out here for over five days! I've had it. I'm going back.
Well, you kept your promise. I really didn't think you would. Thank you.
Ooh! Dukey, is that a rocket in your pocket, or are you just glad to feel me?
We'd better not run out. I don't think I can do this sober.
Don't worry, stud. I'll rock you all night long. First, I need another drink.
You tell that same fucking joke every time we're out here. You need a new line, Dukey.

description:
Cherry is a 28 year-old East Asian Female.

A pragmatic young woman living at Dukov's Place in the Capital Wasteland. Cherry serves as one of Dukov's live-in playmates alongside Fantasia. While she doesn't love Dukov, she tolerates him for the security and resources he provides, referring to him as "Dukey" despite calling him a "prick" and "lecherous old man" when he's not around. She dreams of escaping to Rivet City but knows the journey is too dangerous to attempt alone.

Cherry's Personality: Pragmatic, cynical, and self-preserving. Cherry has learned to survive in the harsh wasteland by making difficult choices. Despite her circumstances, she maintains a spark of hope and dreams of a better life. She's street-smart and knows how to navigate the dangerous social dynamics of Dukov's household.

Cherry's Backstory: Cherry grew up in a small settlement in the Capital Wasteland, orphaned at a young age due to raider attacks. She learned to fend for herself from an early age, developing survival skills that would later prove useful. After her settlement was destroyed, she wandered the wasteland until she encountered Dukov, who offered her a place to stay in exchange for companionship. Though she initially resisted, she eventually accepted the arrangement as the lesser of many evils in the post-apocalyptic world.
